sentences.en: He thought the poetry of Whitman barbarous.
sentences.cn: 他认为惠特曼的诗歌太粗俗。

sentences.en: It is a barbarous way to extend territory by arms.
sentences.cn: 以武力扩张领土是一种野蛮的方式.

sentences.en: It is barbarous to call at 5 a.m.
sentences.cn: 清晨五点给人打电话是缺乏教养的行为.

sentences.en: It is only barbarous peoples who undergo rapid growth after a victory.
sentences.cn: 只有野蛮民族才会凭一战之功突然强盛.

sentences.en: It is so ugly, so barbarous.
sentences.cn: 这如此丑陋, 如此野蛮!

sentences.en: It was barbarous to be happy when Edmund was suffering.
sentences.cn: 当埃德蒙痛苦的时候自己却心头高兴是残忍的.

sentences.en: It was barbarous to treat prisoners in that manner.
sentences.cn: 如此对待犯人,真是太残忍了.

sentences.en: She received the most barbarous treatment.
sentences.cn: 她受到他们极为残暴的待遇.

sentences.en: the barbarous treatment of these prisoners of war
sentences.cn: 对这些战俘的残酷待遇

sentences.en: The best human intelligence is still decidedly barbarous.
sentences.cn: 极高的智慧必定仍然是野性的.

sentences.en: The language in which the hag addressed them was a strange and barbarous Latin.
sentences.cn: 那个母夜叉对他们说话时所用的语言是一种古怪而不规范的拉丁语.

sentences.en: The trade in exotic birds is barbarous.
sentences.cn: 买卖奇异鸟类是很残忍的。

sentences.en: Their barbarous treatment of prisoners aroused great rage.
sentences.cn: 他们对犯人的残酷虐待激起了极大的愤怒.

sentences.en: They were guilty of the most barbarous and inhuman atrocities.
sentences.cn: 他们犯有最野蛮、最灭绝人性的残暴罪行.

sentences.en: To civilize the barbarous people is not easy.
sentences.cn: 要使野蛮人开化不是简单的.

sentences.en: Why are such beautiful things confined to such barbarous countries?
sentences.cn: 为什么在这么不开化的地方还有这些好东西?

trans.tran_cn: 粗野的，野蛮的，残暴的，粗声粗气的
